compression.description: Compression of the payload (only gzip or is supported, no compression is the default)

enabled.description: Enabled indicates whether to not retry sending batches in case of export failure.

endpoint.description: Override of the Pubsub Endpoint, leave empty for the default endpoint

initial_interval.description: InitialInterval the time to wait after the first failure before retrying.

insecure.description: Only has effect if Endpoint is not ""

logs.description: LogsSignalConfig allows for custom log configuration

attributes.description: Attributes are custom Pub/Sub message attributes

encoding.description: Encoding is a custom encoding for the marshaling the data onto the message

max_elapsed_time.description: MaxElapsedTime is the maximum amount of time (including retries) spent trying to send a request/batch. Once this value is reached, the data is discarded. If set to 0, the retries are never stopped.

max_interval.description: MaxInterval is the upper bound on backoff interval. Once this value is reached the delay between consecutive retries will always be `MaxInterval`.

metrics.description: MetricsSignalConfig allows for custom log configuration

attributes.description: Attributes are custom Pub/Sub message attributes

encoding.description: Encoding is a custom encoding for the marshaling the data onto the message

multiplier.description: Multiplier is the value multiplied by the backoff interval bounds

enabled.description: Enabled indicates if ordering is enabled

from_resource_attribute.description: FromResourceAttribute is a resource attribute that will be used as the ordering key.

remove_resource_attribute.description: RemoveResourceAttribute indicates if the ordering key should be removed from the resource attributes.

project.description: Google Cloud Project ID where the Pubsub client will connect to

randomization_factor.description: RandomizationFactor is a random factor used to calculate next backoffs Randomized interval = RetryInterval * (1 ± RandomizationFactor)

timeoutsettings.description: Timeout for all API calls. If not set, defaults to 12 seconds.

topic.description: The fully qualified resource name of the Pubsub topic

traces.description: TracesSignalConfig allows for custom log configuration

attributes.description: Attributes are custom Pub/Sub message attributes

encoding.description: Encoding is a custom encoding for the marshaling the data onto the message

user_agent.description: User agent that will be used by the Pubsub client to connect to the service

watermark.description: Watermark defines the watermark (the ce-time attribute on the message) behavior

allowed_drift.description: Indication on how much the timestamp can drift from the current time, the timestamp will be capped to the allowed maximum. A duration of 0 is the same as maximum duration

behavior.description: Behavior of the watermark. Currently, only of the message (none, earliest and current, current being the default) will set the timestamp on pubsub based on timestamps of the events inside the message
